ModMetaData.name: [RS] Sanguophage Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: Shackleberry
ModMetaData.description:
This mod tweaks sanguophages to include some additional drawbacks and challenges.
[b]Changes[/b]
- UV Sensitivity increased from Mild to Intense - Forced Night Owl if More Genes is loaded - Reduced tend quality of Coagulate - Coagulate now causes Hemostatic Shock
[b]Hemostatic Shock[/b]
Hemostatic Shock is a new condition that causes a pawn to be downed for a duration based on the number of wounds tended by Coagulate. The amount of time can be configured in mod settings, or disabled completely.
